item.title: New York: Food, History and Culture of Brooklyn Tour
item.description: The food and drink choices in Brooklyn can be overwhelming—but on this small-group walking tour, you'll discover the best of the borough's culinary destinations. Exploring characterful neighborhoods like Carroll Gardens and Cobble Hill, you can look forward to trying everything from Middle Eastern baked goods and Italian bites to old-fashioned soda fountain treats and beyond. By the end of the tour, walk away with new local knowledge, and receive tips for the rest of your trip.

image.alt: New York: Food, History and Culture of Brooklyn Tour

item.title: NYC Brooklyn Bridge and DUMBO Food Tour
item.description: Head off the tourist trail—and get a taste for Brooklyn's food culture, as you visit some of its tastiest eateries and artisan businesses—on this small-group or private walking tour. Come hungry, and follow your guide to eclectic foodie hotspots in the Brooklyn Heights and DUMBO neighborhoods. As you go, sample a range of sweet and savory delights, and discover locals-loved food businesses and markets that many visitors overlook.

image.alt: NYC Brooklyn Bridge and DUMBO Food Tour

item.title: Brooklyn Street Art Walking Tour
item.description: Brooklyn is famous for its bold and bright street art, but it’s not easy to know where to find these creative works. With this walking tour of the Bushwick neighborhood, take in the diversity and culture of the neighborhood’s urban street artists. Check out massive murals and intricate designs as you take to the streets to learn how Brooklyn’s best can turn anything with a surface into a stunning work of public art.

image.alt: Brooklyn Street Art Walking Tour

item.title: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover the East Coast beyond New York with this 3-day, multi-stop tour. Travel to Washington D.C. via Philadelphia to explore the nation's capital. Continue on to visit Corning and the US side of Niagara Falls, with the option to ride the iconic Maid of the Mist, visit Cave of the Winds, and more (all activities at an additional cost).

image.alt: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free

item.title: Williamsburg Food Tasting & Walking Tour
item.description: Immerse yourself in the culture and food of Williamsburg, Brooklyn on this half-day small-group walking tour. Discover the hip neighborhood and the spots that locals love with your foodie guide and just a small group for company. As you stroll through Williamsburg's charming streets, stop at several eateries, and sample some of the Big Apple's most famous dishes, including bagels, dumplings, pizza, and more.

image.alt: Williamsburg Food Tasting & Walking Tour

item.title: The Escape Game Brooklyn: Epic 60-Minute Adventures in City Point
item.description:
Our City Point location is right in the middle of the Brooklyn action, conveniently close to countless entertainment, shopping, and dining options. This is the perfect spot for an escape room day or night out! Some of our top spots for a meal are Fat Fowl and Junior’s Restaurant and Bakery. The Escape Game Brooklyn features six unique games including Cosmic Crisis, our newest escape room, and Prison Break, our hardest game. Each family-friendly option includes multiple rooms and can hold up to 8 players.
These adventures offer a one-of-a-kind premium experience. Follow clues and solve puzzles to complete your mission together. We offer the best escape rooms and the fastest customer support. Come see why our escape rooms win awards.

image.alt: The Escape Game Brooklyn: Epic 60-Minute Adventures in City Point

item.title: Brooklyn Neighborhoods Small-Group Bike Tour
item.description: Immerse yourself in Brooklyn’s one-of-a-kind ambiance, and get an overview of its destination-worthy neighborhoods, on a small-group bicycle tour of the borough. Meet your guide in DUMBO (right below the Manhattan and Brooklyn Bridges), grab your bike and helmet, and set off on two wheels. See Fort Greene and Prospect Park, explore Carroll Gardens and Cobble Hill, and visit other top neighborhoods, all in just half a day.

image.alt: Brooklyn Neighborhoods Small-Group Bike Tour

item.title: Made in Brooklyn Tour
item.description: Discover Brooklyn’s crafty side by visiting the artists and creatives who give the borough its hip reputation on this Brooklyn walking tour. Learn more about local history while visiting the small makers and artisans with a proud, local Brooklyn guide. Stop to snap photos of landmarks, tour factories, and shop stand-out collections along the way.

image.alt: Made in Brooklyn Tour

item.title: Brooklyn street art and hipster culture tour in French
item.description:
Discover two of Brooklyn's trendiest neighborhoods: Bushwick and Williamsburg!
Our French guides, expatriates in New York for years, are keen to make you spend a friendly moment full of original discoveries!

image.alt: Brooklyn street art and hipster culture tour in French

item.title: Private Sail New York with Brooklyn Sail (Reserve the entire boat)
item.description: Get out on the water in New York with this private sailing charter for groups of up to six passengers. Set sail from Brooklyn and enjoy views of the Brooklyn Bridge, World Trade Center, Statue of Liberty, Ellis Island, Governor’s Island, and the Manhattan skyline. Guests are welcome to bring their own food and drinks.

image.alt: Private Sail New York with Brooklyn Sail (Reserve the entire boat)

item.title: Williamsburg Bites: Brooklyn Food Tour by Like A Local Tours
item.description: Discover the cultural delights and delectable bites of Brooklyn on a culinary walking tour of the Williamsburg neighborhood with a small group. Delve into the rich culinary history of the area with your guide and visit iconic eateries to sample treats like barbecue and what is considered the best pizza in Brooklyn. Pleasure your palate with tastings interspersed with vibrant street art and panoramic vistas of New York’s globally renowned skyline.

image.alt: Williamsburg Bites: Brooklyn Food Tour by Like A Local Tours

item.title: New York Private Airport Transfer to City Center
item.description: Welcome to our top-tier airport transfer service at JFK New York! From the moment you arrive, we are committed to delivering a seamless and stress-free travel experience. Our modern and comfortable fleet, along with our professional drivers, ensures a reliable and efficient journey to your destination. Whether you're here for business or leisure, our service guarantees punctuality, safety, and exceptional customer care. Rely on us to make your airport transfer at JFK smooth and enjoyable, so you can focus on what truly matters.

image.alt: New York Private Airport Transfer to City Center

item.title: Brooklyn Heights, DUMBO and Brooklyn Bridge guided tour in French
item.description:
On this guided tour in French, discover two beautiful neighborhoods in Brooklyn, anchored on the banks of the East River and cross the Brooklyn Bridge!
Our French guides, expatriates in New York for years, are keen to make you spend a friendly moment full of original discoveries!

image.alt: Brooklyn Heights, DUMBO and Brooklyn Bridge guided tour in French

item.title: Brooklyn NYC Food & Walking Tour with a 5th Generation New Yorker
item.description: Eat like a true local with the help of a 5th-generation Brooklynite to show you around some of the area’s best eateries. From bagels to coffee to, of course, pizza, you’ll spend a fascinating 2.5 hours tasting your way through town. Not only that, but your guide will tell you all about Brooklyn's history, from the 1800s to the present day.

image.alt: Brooklyn NYC Food & Walking Tour with a 5th Generation New Yorker

item.title: Brooklyn Bike Tour
item.description: See the best of Brooklyn, all in just half a day—and enjoy an active way to explore—on this small-group biking tour. Pick between morning and afternoon start times, meet your guide in DUMBO, and grab your bike and helmet. You’ll discover dozens of neighborhoods and attractions, including Fort Greene, Prospect Park, Brooklyn Heights, and more. You’ll also stop at local chocolatiers, distillers, and more for stories and samples.

image.alt: Brooklyn Bike Tour

item.title: Brooklyn Donut Adventure and Walking Food Tour (Small Group)
item.description: Enjoy a sampling of Brooklyn’s sweet treats—and explore two of its most desirable neighborhoods as you go—on this donut tasting tour. Pick between morning and afternoon start times, meet your guide in Williamsburg, and set off on foot. You’ll visit four of the borough’s most popular bakeries, from modern favorites to old-school classics, and will enjoy generous samples as you go.

image.alt: Brooklyn Donut Adventure and Walking Food Tour (Small Group)

item.title: Manhattan and Brooklyn Bridge Bicycle Tour
item.description: Travel across two of New York’s iconic bridges in the space of a few hours—and enjoy a one-of-a-kind perspective on the city’s waterfront—on this seamless, small-group tour by bike. Meet your guide in Brooklyn’s DUMBO neighborhood, grab your bike and helmet, and set off on two wheels. You'll cycle across both the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges for exceptional city views, will visit atmospheric neighborhoods in both boroughs, and learn insider facts and stories en route.

image.alt: Manhattan and Brooklyn Bridge Bicycle Tour

item.title: Brooklyn Art Walk, Drink Crawl, & City Views
item.description: Get the full Brooklyn experience as you embark on a street art walk that includes a tasting tour. Join a small group and explore the DUMBO district, taking the murals, artisan shops, and historic warehouses. Learn how the area has changed over the last 50 years and take in the views of all three bridges that connect Brooklyn to Manhattan from a rooftop bar.

image.alt: Brooklyn Art Walk, Drink Crawl, & City Views

item.title: A Day in Brooklyn Bike Tour
item.description: Experience Brooklyn like a local on a small-group cycling tour through the borough’s hippest neighborhoods, including tough-to-reach areas that visitors often miss. Avoid the stress of navigating on your own as you follow a guide to popular landmarks and hidden gems, including possible stops at breweries and distilleries (tastings own expense). Photo stops along the way make this a popular choice for active New York visitors.

image.alt: A Day in Brooklyn Bike Tour

item.title: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover Niagara Falls, and other regional highlight, on this 2-day tour from New York City. Stop at the Corning Museum of Glass and Watkins Glen State Park (optional tours, with extra expense), head to Niagara for a night tour with fireworks show. The next morning, discover the best of the region, including a Maid of the Mist trip (separate expense) in season, before returning to New York.

image.alt: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free

item.title: Photo sessions in New York with a French-speaking photographer
item.description:
New York in French has hired the exclusive services of Johnny, professional photographer who has lived in New York since 2011 and covers exceptional media, sporting and cultural events such as Fashion Week!
We offer photo sessions (shootings) of 1 to 2 hours in emblematic places of the city: Brooklyn Bridge Park and DUMBO, Times Square, Central Park… so many places that will serve as a natural setting for superb photos- memories that you will be eager to share with your loved ones!
Whether you are alone, as a couple, with family or friends, Johnny will put you at ease and make you strike a pose with disconcerting ease. He will also listen to your desires and your staging ideas, so you are sure to get photos that are as beautiful as they are original. And if you doubt it, take a look at the photos below!

image.alt: Photo sessions in New York with a French-speaking photographer

item.title: Best of Brooklyn Walking Tour in Williamsburg
item.description: This walking tour through Brooklyn's trendy Williamsburg neighborhood offers a brief look at Brooklyn history and its influence on contemporary culture, with an insider guide leading the way. Meet-up just steps from the subway, and begin your adventure uncovering trends and traditions—from the urban street art scene to hip local businesses. Venture past historical buildings, chic boutiques, and neighborhood cafés reflecting the area's laid-back vibe. Then be sure to capture the iconic Manhattan skyline from the scenic Brooklyn waterfront.

image.alt: Best of Brooklyn Walking Tour in Williamsburg

item.title: New York Aquarium Admission
item.description: Guarantee your admission to the New York Aquarium in advance—and make your visiting experience seamless—with this convenient pre-booking option. Enjoy the flexibility of an any-day access admission ticket (available in peak and off-peak options), and stop by the aquarium at a time that suits you. This attraction is ideal for travelers with young children, and gives you the freedom to explore at your own pace.

image.alt: New York Aquarium Admission

item.title: Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Bridge, and DUMBO Food Tour
item.description: Immerse yourself in New York City’s hippest borough—and discover several of its highlight neighborhoods, as well as its foodie favorites—on this small-group walking and tasting tour. Meet your guide in Brooklyn Heights and set off on foot: you’ll stroll to areas like the Brooklyn Promenade and DUMBO, will enjoy tasty bites like pizza and pastries, and can admire highlights like the Brooklyn Bridge and Manhattan skyline as you go.

image.alt: Brooklyn Heights, Brooklyn Bridge, and DUMBO Food Tour
